description.en: Configurable FPGA board with Arduino-like form factor.
description.ja: ハードウェア構成をカスタマイズできるFPGA搭載のArduino互換形状ボード。

description.en: Basic firmware with scripting language runtime. This configuration has SPI, I2C, UART and Servo peripherals.
description.ja: スクリプト言語のランタイムを搭載した標準的なファームウェア。SPI、I2C、UART、サーボ制御機能が使用できます。

description.en: Embedded script engine board powered by FPGA
description.ja: 組み込み向けスクリプト言語エンジンが使用できるFPGA搭載ボード

description.en: Basic firmware with scripting language runtime. This configuration has SPI, I2C, UART and Servo peripherals.
description.ja: スクリプト言語のランタイムを搭載した標準的なファームウェア。SPI、I2C、UART、サーボ制御機能が使用できます。

releases.name: Test Release v0.1.1
releases.description:
Release for Maker Faire Taipei 2017 Demo

- Fix buffered_uart interrupt lost
releases.author: kimushu

description.en: This firmware includes embeddable JavaScript engine, Duktape. Supports JavaScript/TypeScript.
description.ja: 組み込み向けJavaScriptエンジンの「Duktape」を搭載したファームウェアです。JavaScript/TypeScriptによる開発ができます。

description.en: Compact microcontroller board with Ruby language support. Powered by Renesas RX631 group MCU.
description.ja: Rubyが気軽に使える小型マイコンボード。ルネサス製32ビットマイコンRX631グループMCUを搭載。

description.en: This is the V2 library firmware of GR-CITRUS provided by Wakayama.rb.
description.ja: Wakayama.rbが提供するGR-CITRUSのV2ライブラリファームウェアです。

releases.name: Release v2.33
releases.description:
Release mruby firmware v2.33 of GR-CITRUS.
We canceled the size limit (8 Kb) of the mrb file. However, if you run a large file size, the system will hang. be careful.
releases.author: tarosay

description.en: It is the minimum configuration firmware.
description.ja: 最小構成のファームウェアです。

description.en: It is the firmware that extended the String system mrbgem.
description.ja: 文字処理系Gemを拡張したファームウェアです。

description.en: It is Firmware which extended Fiber mrbgem.
description.ja: Fiber Gemを拡張したファームウェアです。

name.en: Additional version of Motor Class for SAMBOU-KAN in Minimum Configuration
name.ja: 最小構成版にSAMBOU-KAN用のMotor Classの追加版

description.en: Motor Class for SAMBOU-KAN is added to the minimum configuration version.
description.ja: 最小構成版にSAMBOU-KAN用のMotor Classを追加しています。

releases.name: Release v2.31
releases.description:
Release mruby firmware v2.31 of GR-CITRUS.
In the new release, the led command has been updated.
This release also includes a new release firmware, an additional version of sprintf - Gem, an additional version of sprintf - gem and String - Gem, and an additional version of Fiber - Gem.
